Member Function Documentation

void * webEngine::iInventory::GetInterface ( const string &  ifName  )  [virtual]

Gets an interface.

Returns abstracted pointer to the requested interface, or NULL if the requested interface isn't provided by this object. The interface name depends on the plugin implementation.

Parameters:
ifName - Name of the interface.
Return values:
null if it fails, else the interface.

Implements webEngine::iPlugin.

Reimplemented in webEngine::HttpInventory.

Starts the inventory process.
